name: Baroqkue
description:
Set in the 17th century, Baroqkue mixes, in a unconventional way, Historical and fantasy features.

Every Character has a story to tell and a complex background that will be explored in depth.

Can a man fight against himself and win? Or is he doomed by destiny to repeat his past again and again? The soul-searching questions and fascinating answers never end.

Explore the deepness of the dungeons you will encounter, prevail against your enemies with the help of your party to gradually unravel the mysteries of this strange new world, fight with a unique 2d and easy to use battle system.
